reviewText: Possibly some the worst acting and storyline I've ever seen.  To be fair, I didn't see the whole thing.  We tried...really tried.  The other two reviews gave me hope but I couldn't ever see it making the turn into something decent.  After about 20-30 minutes I decided to turn it off and watch something else.

What an awesome movie! As a 3rd generation Greek-American, this movie was heart-warming and a rare treat in Christmas movies by being cute/corny as well as meaningful. Helped to drive home the true meaning of Christmas: faith, family, and love. Definitely recommend to Greeks (my Mom) and non-Greeks (my Dad) alike! Bravo!

here it is a few days post Valentine's, and I just watched this Christmas movie. My mother was visiting, and we watched it together. I have to tell you, it is one of the few movies I think we have enjoyed equally. It really is the epitome of feel good (with no trace of saccharine), funny, and actually somewhat clever. If you are lucky enough to watch it with people you love, you will be glad you did. If you watch it by yourself, you will want to call someone you love as soon as it ends.
Also, it really is suitable for anytime of year. The message is in no way limited to Christmas.
This is a heart warming story about a slightly dysfunctional Greek family.  Funny and charming.

incredible cheesy, superficial, story has no "soul"
Bad acting and script

This movie is one the best Christmas movies I've seen in a while. I laughed, I cried, and I would recommend this movie to anyone, Greek or not. This movie reminded me of why I became a Christian and renewed my faith, at the same time it provided a thoughtful and touching story.

Awesome film! Very much fun to watch and touching. The father - son relationship was written extremely well!
The Greek/American experience has really taken off in film. Great to see.
Get your family together and watch this movie! You'll all laugh and cry!
What a great movie! You will cry, and laugh along with the hilarious cast. Definitely a must watch for the upcoming holiday season.
